Label.en: After all, there's much more that goes intro the construction of a building like the Eiffel Tower than just design... as we'll soon see!

Label.en: So... not only was there the chance that the Eiffel tower could have been called something different... but also that it could have been in a different city!

Label.en: The project was originally offered to Barcelona!
